Sentencas: In the solid oxide fuel cell field, the gadolinium doped ceria (GDC) is widely used as interlayer between oxygen electrode and electrolyte materials, as for instance La2NiO4+delta (LNO) and 3 mol.% Y2O3-ZrO2 (TZ3Y), respectively.
Titulo: Ceria doped with praseodymium instead of gadolinium as efficient interlayer for lanthanum nickelate SOFC oxygen electrode

Sentencas: However, cation interdiffusion occurs between GDC and LNO/TZ3Y during their sintering steps at high temperature, which finally lowers the electrochemical performance of the cathode for the oxygen reduction reaction (ORR).
Titulo: Ceria doped with praseodymium instead of gadolinium as efficient interlayer for lanthanum nickelate SOFC oxygen electrode

Sentencas: In this paper, an alternative interlayer is proposed, the praseodymium doped ceria (PrDC with 30 at.% Pr).
Titulo: Ceria doped with praseodymium instead of gadolinium as efficient interlayer for lanthanum nickelate SOFC oxygen electrode

Sentencas: It is shown that reactivity occurs between PrDC and TZ3Y, but the compounds formed seem to favour the ORR.
Titulo: Ceria doped with praseodymium instead of gadolinium as efficient interlayer for lanthanum nickelate SOFC oxygen electrode

Sentencas: Besides, little reactivity is detected between LNO and PrDC.
Titulo: Ceria doped with praseodymium instead of gadolinium as efficient interlayer for lanthanum nickelate SOFC oxygen electrode

Sentencas: As a result, the total resistances, i.e. series and polarization resistance obtained with a LNO//PrDC//TZ3Y half-cell from 500 degrees C to 800 degrees C are much lower than those obtained with a LNO//GDC//TZ3Y half-cell, sintered in the same conditions.
Titulo: Ceria doped with praseodymium instead of gadolinium as efficient interlayer for lanthanum nickelate SOFC oxygen electrode

Sentencas: In addition, differences in the shape of the impedance diagrams are observed depending on the interlayer: this feature is discussed throughout the paper.
Titulo: Ceria doped with praseodymium instead of gadolinium as efficient interlayer for lanthanum nickelate SOFC oxygen electrode
